Ice put a Tele kinetic barrier between Mustex, her, and Grizzltron. the
force of the explosion forced her back against the wall with a thud.

"Reactivate shields" Veratis instructed as debris from the explosion flew
across the room. retransforming to his half bat form he extended his wings,
trying to wrap them around and hold the raging maniac, "Do we have to dance
this dance again?" the scientist asked as he once again fought for control.
----- Original Message -----
From: <hugar_twriker@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 31, 2001 6:20 PM
Subject: Re: old but still strong.


�Grizzltron�


   Grizzltron Saw these two new bots come in, "GO AWAY!"  Grizzltron
quickly aimed his gernade launcher at Ice and Mustex and fired 2
gernades.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> The post between Veratis and Grizzletron  was supposed to have
taken place a
> while ago but Proto hasn't posted in a while so I guess we can work
with
> this.
>
> Ice and Mustex entered the lab, Before Ice could speak Mustex made
his
> comment. Veratis remained calm turning to the new visitor. "Megaton
was an
> unfortunate accident but as always in the name of science those
things
> happen." He quickly changed the subject turning to Ice. "Since he's
with you
> I take it he's a friend."
>
> Ice transformed to her polar bear form and stepped forward. "I
found him
> near the alliance base, He was to close to where I was so I decided
to get
> away before we were spotted by any Alliance troops." The mutant
scanned her
> new associate and still saw no reason to question him. "I'm not
sensing any
> agressive tendancies from him so I guess he's safe." She turned
seeing the
> frozen bot in the lab. "What happened to him?" she asked.
>
> "His gears just stopped working." The old scientist replied, "We
were having
> a little chat and suddenly he stopped responding. I'm thinking of
putting
> him in my study as a form of modern art."
>
> Grizzltron stood perfectly still, the same pose he was in for about
a
> hundred posts.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <dewboy30816@y...>
> To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> Sent: Sunday, July 29, 2001 3:33 PM
> Subject: Re: old but still strong.
>
>
> Mustex:THEN WHY THE FREAK DID YOU CREATE MEGATON! That's right! I
> know! Somewhere in your security something slipped!
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > "If I wished you reformatted I would have done so while you were
in
> the CR
> > chamber." Veratis replied looking through some notes that scanned
> across one
> > of his stations. He understood Grizzltrons suspicions and hoped
> logic would
> > prevail. "If I would have forced you to reformat you surely would
> hold
> > malice towards me. I only wish for peace, and learning."

> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:

> > that it was
> > > every bots dream to upgrade into a better body. "As you wish,
you
> > are still
> > > welcome to stay and make use of the resources I can provide." he
> > stepped
> > > back and deactivated the shields protecting the lab. "I have a
> wide
> > variety
> > > of archive discs, planetary scans, and science records for you
to
> > read if
> > > you'd like to learn, I have no secrets to hide whats mine is
yours
> > to use."

you

archives
